snippet.title: The Sunday // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3126440/The_Sunday/

The Sunday is a short walkthrough horror game where the idea of being alone will hunt you, until the darkness settles in your brain. The line between reality and nightmare is razor thin.

Developed by @carb-development
